---
category: news
title: "Growing public concern about the role of artificial intelligence in daily life"
excerpt: "The rise in concern about AI has taken place alongside growing public awareness. Nine-in-ten adults have heard either a lot (33%) or a little (56%) about artificial intelligence. The share who have heard a lot about AI is up 7 points since December 2022."
